name: breed_nft
attributes: # [doc = " ２つの親NFTから子NFTを生成するが、"]
# [doc = " breeding_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致を検証していない"]
body: let breeding = & mut ctx . accounts . breeding_account ;
breeding . parent1 = ctx . accounts . parent1_mint . key () ;
breeding . parent2 = ctx . accounts . parent2_mint . key () ;
breeding . offspring_count = breeding . offspring_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . offspring_mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_offspring_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . mint_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: breeding_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付与して照合すべき"]

fields.name: parent1_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 親１のNFTミントアカウント"]

fields.name: parent2_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 親２のNFTミントアカウント"]

fields.name: offspring_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 生成する子NFTのミントアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user_offspring_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの子NFT受取用トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: mint_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ミント権限を持つアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この生成権を持つユーザーの Pubkey"]
